profile:
With over 25 years experience of mastering the art of home restorations, G.H. Restoration became the leading contractor in tuckpointing (repointing), purging, sealing, driveway construction and new building openings for windows and doors. Our expertise is driven by in-depth restoration knowledge, practice and techniques to ensure that your house looks aesthetically pleasing. Our artistic brick restoration with a perfect colour match, windows and doors additions that seamlessly blend, or our purging, sealing, driveway services, are making sure that your house regains its natural look while is visually appealing.

Our Services:

>>> Tuckpointing (repointing) & Brick Restoration
>>> Purging & Sealing
>>> Driveway & Walkway construction
>>> New building openings for windows and doors

Get in touch with us for your FREE ESTIMATE at ghrestoration@hotmail.com or by calling us at 905-356-2932. Become familiar with our projects at ghrestoration.ca.

We're looking forward to working with you!

*** Fully Insured***
*** Over 25 years of Experience***
*** Highest Customer Satisfaction***
*** FREE ESTIMATES***

>>> CALL 905-356-2932 or EMAIL ghrestoration@hotmail.com <<<
